p: The human liver cancer cell line (HepG2) was obtained from Pasteur Institute (Tehran, Iran). They were maintained at 37°C in an incubator under 5% CO 2 and cultured in RPMI 1640 supplemented with 10% (v/v) fetal bovine serum (FBS), 100 U/mL penicillin, and 100 mg of streptomycin/ml. After 80% confluency, cells were harvested by trypsin.
